help-file.title: SKILL_WARRIOR
help-file.content:
The following is a list of all skills available to the Warrior class:
Skills --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 1st level: 1h bludgeon, 1h flaying, 1h piercing, 1h slashing, 2h bludgeon, 2h flaying, 2h slashing, bandage, bash, berserk, blindfighting, carve, climb, disarm, dodge, double attack, dual wield, first aid, fishing, hitall, kick, mine, mount, parry, rescue, retreat, riposte, shield block, swim, switch opponents, unarmed damage 25th level: reach weapons 51st level: triple attack 56th level: quadruple attack
Warrior Specializations --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Swordsman, Guardian
